planning::EscapeObstaclesPathPlanner Class Reference

This planner finds a path to quickly get out of an obstacle. If the start point isn't in an obstacle, returns a path containing only the start point. More...

static double step_size ()
 

Detailed Description

This planner finds a path to quickly get out of an obstacle. If the start point isn't in an obstacle, returns a path containing only the start point.

Member Function Documentation

◆ find_non_blocked_goal()

Point planning::EscapeObstaclesPathPlanner::find_non_blocked_goal ( rj_geometry::Point  pt,
std::optional< rj_geometry::Point >  prev_pt,
const rj_geometry::ShapeSet &  obstacles,
int  max_itr = 300 
)
static

Uses an RRT to find a point near to @pt that isn't blocked by obstacles. If @prev_pt is give, only uses a newly-found point if it is closer to @pt by a configurable threshold.

Parameters
rrt_loggerOptional callback to log the rrt tree after it's built
